original_title: Israel’s Netanyahu lashes out at France’s Macron, Australian PM Albanese | Israel-Palestine conflict News | Al Jazeera
article_summary: Israel and France are embroiled in a diplomatic row over Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accusing French President Emmanuel Macron of fueling anti-Semitism in France by planning to recognize Palestinian statehood. France denies the allegations and vows to protect its Jewish citizens. The dispute comes as Israel also criticizes Australia's recognition of Palestinian statehood and revokes visas for Australian diplomats.</s>
